entry.title: Chettinad Mullu Murukku - முள்ளு முறுக்கு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 150.00

Mullu Muruku

Mullu Muruku  is a popular South Indian snack and traditional delicacy. It is a type of savory, crunchy snack that is commonly prepared during festivals, special occasions, or simply enjoyed as an evening snack with tea or coffee.

The name "Mullu Muruku" translates to "thorn-shaped snack" in Tamil, which accurately describes its appearance.It is made from a mixture of Rice Flour, Fried Farm, Urad Dhal, Moong Dhal, Refined Oil,Salt.. This dough is then shaped into thorny spiral patterns using a specially designed utensil or press.

SERVING GUIDE 

Store in an airtight container.

SHELF LIFE 

30 days

entry.title: Chettinad Kai Murukku
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 220.00

Our handmade Chettinad Kai Muruku —a snack that combines skill, taste, and crunch. Hand-twisted, perfectly crunchy and spiral in shape. Order your murukku online now.

 

Product Information

 Ingredients:

 Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Ginger, Garlic, Refined Oil, Salt

Storage:

Store in an airtight container

Shelf Life: 

30 Days

 Best for:

Festivals, tea-time, or gifting, this crispy delight is a must-have for every snack lover.

 What is Chettinad Kai Murukku?

Chettinad Kai Muruku (also called as suthu murukku, spring murukku or spiral murukku) is a traditional South Indian snack known for its hand-twisted, spiral shape. This snack is famous for its crunchy texture and the intricate, labor-intensive handwork that goes into shaping each murukku, making it a popular delicacy

How is it made?

Made with a mix of Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Ginger and Garlic, each murukku is hand-twisted for swirls with care and deep-fried to golden, crispy perfection.

 FAQS about Kai Murukku

 What are the ingredients used in your Kai Murukku?

Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Ginger, Garlic, Oil, Salt

Why is it named Kai Murukku?

‘Kai’ means hand in Tamil. Kai Murukku is named so because the swirls are shaped by hand, unlike other murukkus that are made using a press or mould.

 How is Kai Murukku different from regular murukku?

Regular murukku is made with a press, while Kai Murukku is twisted by hand, which makes it more authentic and traditional.

entry.title: Chettinad Mullu Murukku-செட்டிநாடு முள்ளு முறுக்கு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 170.00

Mullu Muruku

Mullu Muruku  is a popular South Indian snack and traditional delicacy. It is a type of savory, crunchy snack that is commonly prepared during festivals, special occasions, or simply enjoyed as an evening snack with tea or coffee.

The name "Mullu Muruku" translates to "thorn-shaped snack" in Tamil, which accurately describes its appearance.It is made from a mixture of Rice Flour, Fried Farm, Urad Dhal, Moong Dhal, Refined Oil,Salt.. This dough is then shaped into thorny spiral patterns using a specially designed utensil or press.

The prepared dough is carefully deep-fried in hot oil until it turns golden brown and becomes crispy. The spiral shape gives it an attractive and unique look, making it a favorite among both kids and adults. The combination of flavors from the spices and the crunchy texture makes it a delightful and satisfying snack.

Mullu Muruku is popular in various states of South India, including Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Kerala, and Andhra Pradesh. While the core ingredients and preparation remain consistent, slight variations in the spice mix and regional preferences may exist.

Overall, Mullu Muruku is a beloved snack that holds cultural significance and is cherished by many as part of their culinary heritage. It is an excellent accompaniment to festive celebrations, family gatherings, and a delightful treat to relish on any occasion.

INGREDIENTS OF MULLU MURUKU

Rice Flour, Fried Farm, Urad Dhal, Moong Dhal, Refined Oil,Salt.

SERVING GUIDE OF MULLU MURUKU

Store in an airtight container.

SHELF LIFE OF MULLU MURUKU

30 days

entry.title: Garlic muruku Karam-பூண்டு முறுக்கு காரம்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 150.00

Garlic murukku is a crispy snack that comes from South India. It's like regular muruku but with garlic added for flavor. To make it, we mix rice flour, gram flour (besan), spices, and minced or powdered garlic. Then, we shape the dough into coils or spirals using a special tool and fry it until it's crunchy. Garlic murukku is a tasty snack enjoyed during festivals or as a treat with tea or coffee.

INGREDIENTS 

Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Garlic, Red Chilly, Salt & Refined Vegetable Oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 days

entry.title: Onion muruku-வெங்காய முறுக்கு
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 150.00

Onion Muruku is a savory South Indian snack renowned for its irresistible crunch and enticing flavor. Crafted from a harmonious blend of rice flour, gram flour, and freshly chopped onions, this delectable treat captures the essence of traditional Indian cuisine. Infused with aromatic spices like cumin seeds, sesame seeds, and a hint of asafoetida, each bite delivers a symphony of flavors that tantalize the taste buds.Whether enjoyed as a snack on its own or paired with a cup of steaming chai, Onion Muruku remains a beloved culinary treasure cherished by food enthusiasts everywhere.

INGREDIENTS 

Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Onion, Red Chilly, Salt & Refined Vegetable Oil

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 days

entry.title: Chettinad Thattai-செட்டிநாடு தட்டை
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg

If flying saucers were edible, the out of the world taste is what  'Thattai' is all about! Made with urad flour and seasoned with sesame and chillies, this spicy, fried snack has the zing that would make you addicted to its taste. A sure favourite snack among kids and adults alike, thattai stays an eternal favourite!

உள்ளங்கைக்குள் மாவினை உருண்டை பிடித்து பதமாய் தட்டி தட்டி எண்ணெயில் பொரித்து செய்யப்படும் தட்டை காரசார தின்பண்ட வகைகளில் களைகட்டுகிறது . இது உளுந்தம் பருப்பு மற்றும் பதப்படுத்தப்பட்ட எள் மற்றும் மிளகாய் கொண்டு தயாரிக்கப்படுகிறது. உங்கள் தட்டில் பரிமாறப்படும் ஒரு தட்டையினை சாப்பிட்டுவிட்டால் தட்டினுள் மிஞ்சாது. நிச்சயம் உங்கள் மனதிற்கு நெருக்கமான தின்பண்டமாக தட்டை இருந்திடும்

SERVING GUIDE

entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 160.00

This product contains Dairy items and cannot be shipped to EU and UK

Seedai - Tradition Delivered to Your Doorstep

Indulge in the rich tradition of Seedai snacks by exploring our diverse selection available online. Our carefully crafted Seedai treats offer a delightful blend of crunchiness and authentic flavors, perfect for elevating your snacking experience or enhancing festive celebrations. From classic variations to innovative twists, our online collection showcases the essence of this traditional snack. Discover the convenience of ordering Seedai online and savor the taste of these meticulously prepared treats, delivered right to your doorstep.

Ingredients:

Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Coconut Milk, Refined Oil, Butter, and Salt.

Serving Guide:

Store in an airtight container for lasting freshness.

Shelf Life:

Enjoy the delightful crunch for up to 30 days.

FAQs:

  1. What is Seedai?

    Seedai is a traditional South Indian snack made from rice flour and spices, typically small, round, and crunchy.

  2. Is Seedai sweet or savory?

    Seedai can be both sweet and savory. Uppu Seedai is seasoned with salt and spices, while Vella Seedai is sweetened with jaggery or sugar.

  3. Can Seedai be stored for a long time?

    Yes, properly prepared and fried Seedai can be stored in an airtight container for a couple of weeks. Ensure they are completely cool and dry to prevent moisture.

Explore Our Range:

  • Seepu Seedai
  • Thattai
  • Ribbon Pakoda
  • Thenkulal Muruku

Join us in experiencing the essence of age-old recipes combined with modern convenience through our enticing range of Seedai snacks available for online purchase.

அரிசிமாவும்.வெல்லமும் கலந்து செய்யப்படும் அதிரசத்தின் சுவை ஓர் அதிசய சுவை. அவசர அவசரமாக சாப்பிடாமல் நேரம் தந்து அதிரசத்தை நாவில் கரைய விடுகையில் வெல்லப்பாகுவின் ருசி தித்திக்க வைத்திடும். நீங்களும் சுவையில் கரைந்திட இன்றே ஆர்டர் செய்திடுங்கள் நம்ம பெட்டிக்கடையில்.

சுடசுட தேநீருடன் சுடசுட பொரித்தெடுத்த ரிப்பன் பக்கோடா சாப்பிடுவதே தனி ஆனந்தம்தான். கடலை மாவு, அரிசி மாவு, மிளகாய் பொடி ஆகியவற்றை நன்கு கலந்து எண்ணெயில் பொரித்து எடுக்கையில் வரும் வாசனை அலாதியானது. சோர்வாக இருப்பவரையும் சுறுசுறுப்பாகிடும் ரிப்பன் பக்கோடாவை நீங்களும் சுவைத்திட பெட்டிக்கடையில்.ஆர்டர் செய்யுங்கள்

entry.title: Seepu Seedai-சீப்பு சீடை
entry.summary:
Vendor: Arvind Chettinad Snacks
Type: Veg
Price: 150.00

This fried snack resembling thick serrated finger rings is an authentic chettinad savoury. Seepu seedai, prepared by Arvind Chettinad snacks is made from hand ground rice flour kneaded with butter, manually extruded and fried. These cute little circular pieces of snack are sure to entice the eater, to grab more!

மோதிரவிரல்களில் சீடையினை மாட்டிக்கொண்டு குழந்தை.பருவத்தில் விளையாடிக்கொண்டே சாப்பிட்டிருப்போம். சாப்பிட்ட சாப்பிட தீராத ஆசையுடன் செய்திருந்த அத்தனையும் ருசித்திருப்போம். கைக்குத்தல் அரிசி மாவு வெண்ணையுடன் பிசையப்பட்டு, பின் கைகளால் வறுத்தெடுக்கப்படுகிறது. குழந்தைகளுக்கு பிடித்த நொறுக்குதீனியாக சீப்பு சீடை எப்பொழுதும் இருக்கின்றது. நீங்களும் சுவைத்து மகிழ இன்றே பெட்டிக்கடையில் ஆர்டர் செய்யுங்கள்.

INGREDIENTS

Rice Flour, Fried Gram, Coconut milk, Refined Oi & Salt

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

30 days
